name: Regal Unlimited GA LLP
description: Regal Unlimited is a premium leadership development company specialising in coaching, coach training, and mentoring. Our global reach and impact complement our proud Indian heritage.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: The Coaching school for the world
ShortDescription: Transforming Organizations, Coaching Leaders, Mentoring Coaches, and Healing all.

Highlights.name: Executive Coaching
Highlights.description: Executive Coaching Program nurtures individuals and organizations to achieve identified goals, discover new ideas, overcome limitations and achieve newer levels of success.

Highlights.name: Coaching Unlimited
Highlights.description: Coaching Unlimited is an intensive, immersive program for coaches to level up their coaching practice and build a successful coaching business.

Highlights.name: Regal Coach Leadership Training
Highlights.description: An online foundation coach training program for young and aspiring leaders across the globe to accelerate their leadership journey through acquiring the skill of coaching.

enhanced_description: Regal Unlimited GA LLP is a premium, globally-reaching leadership development company established in 2012, specializing in comprehensive coaching, coach training, and mentoring services. Key offerings include ICF Approved Coach Training, Corporate Leadership Workshops, and Team Coaching. They provide Executive Coaching programs that nurture individuals and organizations to achieve identified goals, a 'Coaching Unlimited' program designed for coaches to level up their practice, and 'Regal Coach Leadership Training' as an online foundation program for young and aspiring leaders. Headquartered in Bengaluru, Regal Unlimited is focused on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency for large and global enterprises.
key_use_cases: Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency for individuals and organizations
Developing internal coaching capabilities within enterprises
Enhancing corporate leadership skills through workshops and coaching
Improving team performance via dedicated team coaching
Providing executive coaching for individual and organizational goal achievement
Professional development and business growth for existing coaches
Foundational leadership training for aspiring leaders
competitive_advantages: ICF Approved Coach Training (industry recognized accreditation)
Global reach and impact, serving enterprises worldwide
Specialization in premium leadership development, coaching, coach training, and mentoring
Comprehensive service portfolio covering executive, team, and coach-specific training
implementation_scenarios: Online delivery for specific training programs (e.g., Regal Coach Leadership Training)
roi_benefits: Achievement of identified organizational and individual goals
Overcoming limitations and achieving new levels of success for individuals and organizations
Successful coaching practice development for professionals
scalability_features: Global reach and impact, serving global enterprises
Online program delivery enabling broader accessibility
